title: Database Design with MongoDB
description: Explore MongoDB and its role in backend development.

chapters.title: Overview
chapters.description: This course introduces you to database design using MongoDB, a popular NoSQL database. You will learn how to structure data with collections and documents, design schemas, perform CRUD operations, and optimize queries. By the end of the course, you will be able to design efficient, scalable databases and integrate MongoDB into modern applications.

chapters.title: Introduction to MongoDB
chapters.description: Learn the basics of MongoDB, a NoSQL database.

chapters.title: CRUD Operations
chapters.description: Perform Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations.

chapters.title: Data Modeling in MongoDB
chapters.description: Learn how to design effective database models.

chapters.title: Indexes and Performance Optimization
chapters.description: Use indexes to optimize MongoDB performance.

chapters.title: Aggregation Framework
chapters.description: Use the MongoDB aggregation framework for data processing.

chapters.title: Backup and Data Recovery
chapters.description: Implement strategies to backup and recover data.

chapters.title: Building RESTful APIs with MongoDB
chapters.description: Learn to integrate MongoDB into RESTful APIs.

chapters.title: Project: Build a Blog Backend with MongoDB
chapters.description: Apply your knowledge by building a blog backend.

lessons.title: Deploying the Backend to the Cloud

prerequisites: Basic JavaScript and Node.js knowledge is recommended.
learningOutcomes: Understand the fundamentals of MongoDB and NoSQL databases.
Perform CRUD operations and optimize queries using indexes.
Design data models for various relationships.
Implement security and authentication in MongoDB.
Build and deploy RESTful APIs with MongoDB.
